title: nam nADu
sahitya:
nam nADu svatantramaDainda innALaip-ponnAl poruttiDal vENDum en-


anupallavi

  nADum kaNDu kETTariyA vidam tuLi rattam shindAmal bhuvi mAdin tilakam


caraNam 1   ponnADu shenru koluvITrirukkum punitan gAndhi aDigaL pannAL
 tavam kiDandu payir sheida payanAi ulagellAm atishayikka
  caraNam 2    tAngoNAda uvakaiyuDan javaharlAl nEhru talaimaiyil jana samudram ponga Angila ANDinil eTTAm mAdam padinaindAm nAL Ananda nAL bhArata nam nADu
